properties.areaDesc: Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 4:10AM EST until January 6 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves
2 to 5 feet occurring.

* WHERE...Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
